  restart_mode = 'from_scratch'

  prefix = 'Si'

  ibrav = 2
  celldm(1) = 10.20
  nat = 2
  ntyp = 1
  ecutwfc = 16
/
&electrons
  mixing_mode = 'plain'
  mixing_beta = 0.7
  conv_thr = 1.0e-8
/
ATOMIC_SPECIES
  Si 28.0855 Si.vbc.UPF
ATOMIC_POSITIONS
  Si 0.00 0.00 0.00
  Si 0.25 0.25 0.25
K_POINTS {automatic}
  8 8 8 0 0 0
